item.title: Oxford Economics says the crumbling housing market will continue deteriorating because of two key factors
item.description: Home prices are 55% higher than they were at the beginning of 2020.

item.title: Congress Pushes for Infertility Tax Credits as U.S. Birth Rate Hits New Low
item.description: The proposed Infertility Treatment Affordability Act would partially subsidize IVF costs.

item.title: Hulk Hogan, Who Helped Turn Pro Wrestling Into a Billion-Dollar Business, Dies at 71
item.description: World Wrestling Entertainment announced the pro wrestler’s death Thursday.

item.title: Why the U.S. Fertility Rate Has Hit an All-Time Low
item.description: The U.S. fertility rate reached a new low in 2024, CDC data shows. What’s going on, and do we need to be worried?

item.title: AI Ethicists Were Supposed to Be a Booming Job Category. Now They’re Scrounging for Work
item.description: As companies race to adopt AI, they’re sidelining the very people trained to spot red flags—and the consequences could be costly.
